io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class Aurora.Rhythm

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Aurora.Rhythm
  • Enclosing class:
    Aurora

    public class Aurora.Rhythm
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora Rhythm information.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rhythm() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean auxAvailable()
      Indicates if an aux cable (3.5mm) is currently connected to the Rhythm.
      boolean getActive()
      Indicates if the Rhythm's microphone is currently active or not.
      boolean getConnected()
      Indicates if the Rhythm is connected to the Light Panels or not.
      java.lang.String getFirmwareVersion()
      Indicates the Rhythm's firmware version.
      java.lang.String getHardwareVersion()
      Indicates the Rhythm's hardware version.
      int getId()
      Indicates the Rhythm's Id in the Light Panel system.
      int getMode()
      Allows the user to control the sound source for the Rhythm.
      Position getPosition()
      Indicates the position and orientation of the Rhythm in the Light Panels' layout.
      int setMode(int mode)
      Writing 0 to this field sets the Rhythm's sound source to the microphone, and writing 1 to the field sets the sound source to the aux cable.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

                            StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
        Indicates if the Rhythm is connected to the Light Panels or not.

      • auxAvailable

        public boolean auxAvailable()
                     throws StatusCodeException,
                            StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
        Indicates if an aux cable (3.5mm) is currently connected to the Rhythm.
        Returns:
        true, if an aux cable is connected
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException

      • getMode

        public int getMode()
            throws StatusCodeException,
                   StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
        Allows the user to control the sound source for the Rhythm. Mode 0 is the microphone. Mode 1 is the aux (3.5mm) cable.
        Returns:
        the Rhythm mode (0 or 1)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException

      • setMode

        public int setMode(int mode)
            throws StatusCodeException,
                   StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException,
                   StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException
        Writing 0 to this field sets the Rhythm's sound source to the microphone, and writing 1 to the field sets the sound source to the aux cable.
        Parameters:
        mode - the Rhythm mode (0 or 1 only)
        Returns:
        (204 No Content, 401 Unauthorized, 422 Unprocessable Entity)
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException.UnprocessableEntityException - if mode is not either 0 or 1
        StatusCodeException

      • getPosition

        public Position getPosition()
                     throws StatusCodeException,
                            StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
        Indicates the position and orientation of the Rhythm in the Light Panels' layout.
        Returns:
        the Position of the Rhythm
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException
